Comment.val:
OBPL => Branch DflCust DflVendor
Good Issue: BplId => Pengirim CardCode => Customer
Good Receipt: => Good Issue BplId => Penerima CardCode => (select DflCust from obpl where bplId=':1') CardCode => Supplier BplId => (select bplid from obpl where DflVendor=':6')

SQL_STMT_U.val: select docentry,objtype from OIGE (nolock) where datasource='N' and docstatus = 'O' and CANCELED = 'N' and bplid = :5 and (Comments Like '%:1%' :4) and (DocDate Between :2 and ':3')
select docentry,objtype from OIGE (nolock) where datasource=':6' and docstatus = 'O' and CANCELED = 'N' :1 and (Comments Like '%:2%' :5) and (DocDate Between :3 and ':4')
select docentry,objtype from OIGE (nolock) where datasource='S' and docstatus = 'O' and CANCELED = 'N' and (Comments Like '%:1%' :4 ) and (DocDate Between :2 and ':3')

ExpSyntax.val: IF(ISNULL({0,43}) OR {0,43} = '',' OR Comments is Null','')

SQL_STMT_U.val: select docentry,objtype from OIGE (nolock) where datasource='N' and docstatus = 'O' and CANCELED = 'N' and bplid = :5 and (Comments Like '%:1%' :4) and (DocDate Between :2 and ':3')

Text.val: and isnull(cardcode,'') = (select isnull(DflCust,'') from obpl where bplId=:1)
